Text:
It's not easy to install. First, go to BootCamp_4.0\Drivers\Apple, then right click on bootcamp64, click troubleshoot compatibility. Then you have to run cmd as administrator, then in cmd go to \BootCamp_4.0\Drivers\Apple and run bootcamp64.msi
I noticed two minor problems so far. I can't use double finger right click and scrolling with my trackpad. And if my screen turns off due to inactivity and I move the mouse again, the screen always turns on with full brightness.
